channel.title: NPC dialogues... Help me please
channel.description:
How do I add my own customized NPC dialogues for testscape based source? It doesn't have it's own NPCdialogue.cfg file...
Any help?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 23, 2006, 10:13:36 AM[/size][hr]any? lol[br][size=1]Posted at: September 23, 2006, 10:35:26 AM[/size][hr]ANYONE?????? :([br][size=1]Posted at: September 23, 2006, 11:58:47 AM[/size][hr] :rolleyes: waiting for help...
